title: Read the data
text: This is a notebook, used in the screencast video. Note, that the data files are not present here in Jupyter hub and you will not be able to run it. But you can always download the notebook to your local machine as well as the competition data and make it interactive. Competition data can be found here: https://www.kaggle.com/c/springleaf-marketing-response/data

title: Chanseok Kang
text:
Chanseok Kang
I’m Research Engineer in LG Electronics. My role is to deploy energy-efficient algorithm in commercial/business product(refrigerator, washing machine, HVAC etc). Also, I have an experience on developing BSP drivers on 5G environment. I’m very interested in learning something new(AI, Embedded System, Mathematics). Especially, I enjoyed taking MOOC (Massive Open Online Course) when I have free time.

title: Chanseok Kang
text:
Education
 Seoul National University | Seoul, South Korea  M.S in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Mar 2013 - Feb 2015 

Topic: Manycore-based efficient Power Management Framework
Thesis: Hierachical Power Management Framework on Manycore systems using OS Migration Techniques
Advisor: Prof. Bernhard Egger

Chung-Ang University | Seoul, South Korea  B.S in Electrical and Electronics Engineering | Mar 2006 - Feb 2013
